D1 provides residents and guests with a multitude of exceptional facilities including meeting spaces, cafe lounge, spa, gymnasium, 24-hour concierge, valet parking, landscaped gardens, indoor and outdoor swimming pools and full service maintenance.
D1 Tower
A modern and luxurious 80 storey residential tower located in the heart of Dubai. 
D1 rises 284m above the Dubai Creek precinct in Culture Village and is strategically located on a premier waterfront plot, adjacent to Palazzo Versace Dubai. 
D1 is a sister tower to Q1, the world’s fifth tallest residential building, located in Surfers Paradise on the Australian Gold Coast.
Traditional forms of fisherman netting inspired the geometry of D1s podium canopy whilst the timber construction hints back to the deep sea dhow vessels common across Gulf waterways. 
The result is beautiful shade structures and the first free form timber structure in the Middle East.

The villa has a landscaped garden and a private double garage with electric doors.This property is currently rented until December 2019 and can be sold vacant.- Five en-suite Bedrooms- External Maids room- Quiet cul-de-sac- Very close to Pool- Close to gate- Mature landscaped garden- Tenanted until December 2019Company name: Treo HomesRERA ORN: Address: Office 19C6, I-rise, Barsha Heights, Dubai, UAE Office phone no: +97150814593Primary email: info@treo-homes.com']

descriptions: ['DescriptionSpectacularly located on the beach, Vida Residences in\xa0Dubai Creek Harbour is a 33-storey branded tower adjacent to the award-winning Vida Hotel. It occupies the perfect location and it is just a short hop from Dubai Creek Tower, Dubai Square, and Creek Marina. Homeowners can choose between 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments and indulge in award-winning hotel service, a fresh wave of beach activities, and endless discoveries at the nearby Dubai Creek Tower and Dubai Square. Amenities include swimming pool, fully equipped gym, luxury spa, private courtyards and waterfront dining areas. Dubai Creek Harbour is at the heart of a bold new vision for Dubai. With spectacular cultural offerings, world-class residences, shopping, amenities, offices and more, Dubai Creek Harbour represents the net frontier in contemporary life, work and play. Positioned within the Creek and roughly 2.5km from the mangroves of the Ras Al Khor bird sanctuary, this island is separated from the mainland by a canal approximately 100m wide.\xa0 300-Metre Beach 24/7 Valet Parking Waterfront Dining Luxury Spa 24/7 Concierge Service Breathtaking Sunset Views Call Amal on +971506114710 for more detailsLimited Availability']
